title: 의도 전달 - 미묘한 암시
description: 직접적이지 않은 미묘한 암시를 통해 의도를 전달하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: Well, it's your decision, but... if I were you...
It doesn't really matter, but it's just something worth considering.
It's not really my place to say, but just in case.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 미묘한 암시 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 뭐, 네가 결정할 일이지만... 내가 너라면...
sentences.en: Well, it's your decision, but... if I were you...

sentences.kr: 별로 상관없긴 한데, 그냥 생각해볼 만한 얘기야.
sentences.en: It doesn't really matter, but it's just something worth considering.

sentences.kr: 굳이 내가 말할 건 아니지만, 혹시 몰라서.
sentences.en: It's not really my place to say, but just in case.

sentences.kr: 그냥 참고로 하는 말인데, 다른 방법도 있어.
sentences.en: Just for reference, there are other ways too.

sentences.kr: 네 마음대로 해. 다만, 한 가지만 생각해봐.
sentences.en: Do as you wish. Just consider one thing though.

sentences.kr: 내가 뭐라고 할 처지는 아니지만, 조심스럽긴 해.
sentences.en: I'm not in a position to say anything, but I'm a bit cautious.

sentences.kr: 혹시나 해서 하는 말인데, 시기가 좀...
sentences.en: I'm just saying this just in case, but the timing is a bit...

sentences.kr: 별거 아니긴 한데, 그냥 느낌상 좀 그래.
sentences.en: It's nothing major, but something just feels off about it.
